snippet: The aide, Gregory Atkins of P.S. 87, one of the city's most highly regarded public schools, is the second elementary-school aide to be arrested in connection with allegations of sexually abusing students this week.
abstract: The aide, Gregory Atkins of P.S. 87, one of the city's most highly regarded public schools, is the second elementary-school aide to be arrested in connection with allegations of sexually abusing students this week.

byline.original: By ANDY NEWMAN and AL BAKER

headline.main: Aide at Upper West Side School Charged With Sexually Abusing Student
headline.print_headline: Aide at a Manhattan School Is Charged With Sexual Abuse
